## AudioManager.getStreamVolume() method

获取音量大小

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getStreamVolume( audioStream : AudioStream) : number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  audioStream | [AudioStream](./extractor.audiostream.md) | 声音类型,(暂时只接收XR\_AUDIO\_STREAM\_MUSIC类型,设置其他类型时无效)  { number } |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
